	We are a fast-growing BNPL company seeking a proactive and mobile Compliance Officer who will ensure all staff strictly adhere to company policies across multiple branches.

Key Duties


	Carry out routine on-site compliance checks across all company locations.
	Ensure staff adherence to all organizational policies, procedures, and regulatory guidelines.
	Investigate non-compliance issues and follow up on corrective actions.
	Conduct audits, risk assessments, and transactional reviews.
	Train and guide staff on compliance expectations and operational standards.
	Prepare and submit timely compliance reports to management.


Requirements


	BSc / HND in Business Administration or related fields
	Minimum of 1 year of experience in compliance, risk, or related roles.
	Experience in mobile phone sales is required.
	Strong observation, reporting, and communication skills.
	Willingness to move regularly between locations as part of daily duties.


Benefits


	Salary + Performance bonus+ Pension and HMO
	Supportive and learning-driven work environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
